posts.title: Desktop Catapult
posts.content: Spice up things at work by declaring war on your cubicle mates with this desktop catapult. This wildly entertaining and not at all distracting toy sets up in a snap and includes six small spiked balls that you can launch up to thirty feet away.

posts.title: Crazy Cat Lady Action Figure Set
posts.content: Give the ultimate gift for the crazy cat lady in your life with this incredibly realistic action figure set. Included with your purchase of this wild eyed figurine are six toy cats – not counting the cats perched on the figurine’s shoulders and hiding in her robe pocket.

posts.title: Ron Burgundy Action Figure
posts.content: Great Odin’s raven! Ron Burgundy is back – in action figure form! The legendary Channel 4 newscaster returns in all his glory to bring you the latest news, drink good Scotch and share insights from his epic career. And if there’s time, he’ll also play some  jazz flute.

posts.title: Pet Sling Carrier
posts.content: Keep your furry friend safe and comfy when you’re running around town by sticking them in this pet sling carrier. The ingenious design allows you to conveniently carry your pet while keeping your hands free, and it can hold up to fifteen pounds.

posts.title: Game of Thrones Iron Throne Toilet Decal
posts.content: Transform your porcelain crap receptacle into a seat fit for royalty with this Game of Thrones Iron Throne toilet decal.  Available in over 24 different colors, the decal measures 20 x 23 inches and comes with a special squeegee for easy installation.

posts.title: Edible Spoon Maker
posts.content: Give your already delicious meal a little added curb appeal by eating it using these edible spoons. Using this handy appliance, you’ll be able to whip up a batch of four crisp and evenly browned spoons in just three to four minutes.

posts.title: Han Solo Trapped In Carbonite Ice Tray
posts.content: Create out-of-this-world treats that’ll please any sci-fi enthusiast using this Han Solo trapped in carbonite ice tray. You’ll be able to fill this rubber tray with either melted chocolate or water to make little Han Solo chocolate bars or ice cubes.

posts.title: Star Wars Tie Fighter Gas Grill
posts.content: Cook an out of this world meal in true Imperial fashion by using this Star Wars Tie Fighter gas grill. This geeky grill features 220 square inches of cooking space, works with standard size disposable propane tanks, and is compact enough to take anywhere.

posts.title: Fish Utensils
posts.content: Make meal time more entertaining with the subtle whimsy of the fish utensils. Each creatively designed stainless steel utensil is made to resemble a gentle underwater creature. This 5-piece set is ideal for any nautically themed kitchen or summer home.

posts.title: Fantasy Football Championship Belt
posts.content: Show your loved ones you weren’t wasting your life spending countless hours assembling the perfect team when you bring home the fantasy football championship belt. Winning your league just became a lot more interesting.

posts.title: Poop Emoji Plunger
posts.content: Make the unpleasant task of unclogging the toilet a little less shitty using this poop emoji plunger. The plunger head comes designed like the iconic poop emoji, making it great for adding a humorous touch to your bathroom’s decor.

posts.title: Portable Digital Turntable
posts.content: Treat unsuspecting bystanders to an epic set as you drop the beat on them using the portable digital turntable. This pocket sized device features two dual touchscreens that place an entire recording studio at your fingertips so you can record anytime, anywhere.
